Joke.JokeText: What do you call a dog who does magic tricks? A labracadabrador!
What did the duck say when he bought lipstick? Put it on my bill!
Why couldn't the leopard play hide and seek? Because he was always spotted!
What do you call a pig that does Karate? A pork chop
What's the difference between a guitar and a fish? You can tune a guitar, but you can't tuna fish
Why did the fish blush? Because it saw the ocean's bottom
Why do the french eat snails? They don't like fast food!
What type of sandals do frogs wear? Open toad!
What do you get from a pampered cow? Spoiled milk
What do you get when you cross a snake and a bakery? A python!
What is out of bounds? An exhausted kangaroo
What do you call a bear with no ears? A b!
